extendedInfo.description: The Nation is a broadsheet, English-language daily newspaper founded in 1971 and published in Bangkok, Thailand, and is owned by the Nation Multimedia Group.The application provides you the latest updated news.Note: This is a beta version. All Suggestion are mostly welcome.

reviews.title: Bangkok Post does a much better job.
reviews.comment: Although this is a Beta, it would be better if they had developped something that is worth testing.  Many headers are more than one time in the list, the \"articles\" themselves are hardly more than extended headlines. In short: I will uninstall this app. Very disappointing for a newspaper that has a name to uphold.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wooo
reviews.comment: Very nice app that keep me updated
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: Thanks you so much for developing great application
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: needs plenty of work to be done
reviews.comment: rather static; cannot enlarge page using fingers on a Samsung Tab 7 plus
reviews.author: A Google User
